mapper.select: SELECT h_hotel.h_pho, h_hotel.country_ko, h_hotel.city_ko, h_hotel.h_name_ko, COUNT(h_room.h_name_eng) AS room_count FROM h_reserve INNER JOIN h_room ON h_reserve.h_roomnum = h_room.h_roomnum INNER JOIN h_hotel ON h_room.h_name_eng = h_hotel.h_name_eng GROUP BY h_hotel.h_pho, h_hotel.country_ko, h_hotel.city_ko, h_hotel.h_name_ko ORDER BY room_count DESC LIMIT 10;
